properties.name: spring.cloud.loadbalancer.ribbon.enabled
properties.description: Causes `RibbonLoadBalancerClient` to be used by default.

properties.name: spring.cloud.loadbalancer.service-discovery.timeout
properties.description: String representation of Duration of the timeout for calls to service discovery.

properties.name: spring.cloud.loadbalancer.cache.enabled
properties.description: Enables Spring Cloud LoadBalancer caching mechanism.

properties.name: spring.cloud.loadbalancer.retry.avoid-previous-instance
properties.description: Enables wrapping ServiceInstanceListSupplier beans with `RetryAwareServiceInstanceListSupplier` if Spring-Retry is in the classpath.
